Package com.amazon.device.ads

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Ad
    An interface for views used to retrieve and display Amazon ads.
    AdActivity.AdActivityAdapter  
    AdListener
    Tracks life-cycle events of an ad.
    ExtendedAdListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdActivity  
    AdConstants  
    AdError
    This class contains details for why an ad failed to load.
    AdLayout
    An Android view used to retrieve and display Amazon ads.
    AdProperties
    This class contains properties and features of an ad.
    AdRegistration
    This class provides access to global settings and variables.
    AdSize
    Ad sizes supported by the Amazon Mobile Ads API.
    AdTargetingOptions
    The configurable ad targeting options for each ad.
    AmazonFireServicesAdapter  
    AmazonViewableAdSDKBridgeFactory  
    ApplicationDefaultPreferences  
    DefaultAdListener
    A default AdListener implementation.
    GDPRInfo  
    InterstitialAd
    A full screen interstitial ad.
    ModelessInterstitialAd
    A modeless interstitial ad.
    ViewabilityCheckerFactory  
    ViewabilityObserverFactory  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AdError.ErrorCode
    Represents an error type returned when loading an ad.
